metadata.title: CVE-2024-24860 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's bluetooth device driver in{min,max}_key_size_set() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-102-generic - 5.15.0-102.112~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-102-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-102.112~20.04.1
